data.title: Harbourfront Wealth Management
data.meta_description: Miro Svoboda CIM, CFP, FCSI INVESTMENT ADVISOR 236-521-5709 msvoboda@harbourfrontwealth.com View Miro’s Website Vancouver, B.C. Miro’s vision is to be the best financial advisor serving the long-term needs of Canadians. He believes in quality and treats all client relationships the way...
data.text:
Miro’s vision is to be the best financial advisor serving the long-term needs of Canadians.

He believes in quality and treats all client relationships the way he would expect to be treated by a professional. Miro is a corporate presenter and has spoken at over 300 private and corporate events. Miro was voted by his peers as the 2015 Consultant of the Year for leadership, teamwork, and contributing to regional growth and community involvement in the Greater Vancouver Central Region.

Throughout his career, Miro has also received several prestigious awards that solidify his commitment to true wealth management.

Along with Martina, his wonderful wife of 13 years, Miro is the proud parent of two beautiful daughters Sabina and Greta. His extracurricular activity is spent volunteering as a soccer coach.
